Class SetupOptionsContainer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.SetupOptionsContainer
public class SetupOptionsContainer extends Object
Utility class used to hold all info used to open a lobby, used through lambda expression captures.

      public void sendSetup(GUIView view)
      Uses the currently selected parameters to open a lobby.
      Parameters:
      view - GUIView View used to forward the OpenLobbyMessage to the ConnectedState.

      Sets a PlayerCount to be used.
      Parameters:
      count - PlayerCount Count to be selected.
      button - JavaFX node to highlight with a CSS class.
